description: shadowy figures of unknown origin.

name: Grievous Spores
apply_message: You are cursed by druid's spores!
miss_messages: The magical spores cloud your mind.

name: Doused in Runewater
apply_message: You are invigorated by the water!

name: Worm Darkness
apply_message: You are cursed by a wizard's smoke!
miss_messages: Your sight fills with blinding visions.

name: Shadow Sight
desc: You are prepared to face the shadow seer's illusions.

name: Worm Warding
desc: You are prepared to face the worm wizard and it's vile smoke.

name: Slug Shielding
desc: You are prepared to face the slug druid's spores.

bash.msg_success: You cast away the magical spores.

description: A horrible creation, barely able to move and imbibed with dark magic

special_attacks.monster_message: the simulacrum warps towards you with a magical spell.

name: Hellfire
description: Tear at your life force, spilling your inner fire from your heart and all around you.

name: Worm Wizard
